title: The bond between sisters
description: Are the stereotypes about older and younger sisters true?

vocabItems.definition: (informal) make someone answer a difficult question or make a difficult decision in the moment, often embarrassing them in the process
(idiom) do things in your own way; think and behave differently from others
enjoy telling people what to do
allowed to do or have whatever someone (eg. a child) wants, usually with the result that they behave badly
